LanguageData.WNA_RecipeAlphaBees.label: divide a comb
LanguageData.WNA_RecipeAlphaBees.description: devide a comb (or a hive) for products. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_RecipeAlphaBeesBulk.label: divide 50 combs
LanguageData.WNA_RecipeAlphaBeesBulk.description: devide some comb (or a hive) for products. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_RecipeAlphaBeesToo.label: make kibble from bees
LanguageData.WNA_RecipeAlphaBeesToo.description: produce kibble while getting rid of your never-needed bees. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_RecipeAlphaBeesTooBulk.label: make kibble from bees x50
LanguageData.WNA_RecipeAlphaBeesTooBulk.description: produce kibble while getting rid of your never-needed bees. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_RiteAbleting.label: rite ableting
LanguageData.WNA_RiteAbleting.description: break down slag chunks to retrieve useful things, more productive than traditional methods. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_RiteBeastDivision.label: divide a corpse
LanguageData.WNA_RiteBeastDivision.description: divide a corpse so that it can be used for more uses. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
LanguageData.WNA_RiteRebelStriving.label: break down a thing
LanguageData.WNA_RiteRebelStriving.description: break down a weapon or apparel and see if there's something can be recycled. WNA - Whelingnorther Alliance
